summary: As a Software Engineer with 2 years of experience, I specialize in Kotlin and web development and have solid Java knowledge. I am a constant learner and enjoy delving into technical details. In my work, I follow the Boy Scout rule and offer solutions for improving code quality. I am rational and prioritize the benefits of the project over my own personal preferences. I also practice extreme programming techniques such as TDD and pair programming, and regularly provide feedback on my work through frequent PRs and detailed task decomposition.
